talk1.dialogue: Hmm? Was he not your style? But you two seemed so cute together.
Oh well, these things happen sometimes. I can't force you to date Elliot.
Too bad though, he was the best trap in the city.
Well, since you denied to be Elliot's partner, do you wish to meet other bachelors? You haven't been to the pond after all.
You're also free to give up if you decide you're too bad at dating! Fwie fwie fwie fwie!
I'm kidding, but the choise is yours. What will it be, young fellow?

Press W to give up on love.
 Press S to Keep trying and go to the pond.

happy.dialogue: Let's go to the pond. You haven't been there yet.
